param.name: categorical_evidence
param.dialogReference: Categorical evidence raster to which fuzzy membership values are to be assigned to the named classes.

param.name: reclassification
param.dialogReference: Create a DBF remap table with the value, categorical attribute and the Fuzzy Membership integer valued membership. The reclassify tool will only take integers. Thus if a membership of 0.3 is desired, the user would enter a 3 and the divisor would be entered below as 10.

param.name: rescale_constant
param.dialogReference: Enter the number that is used to divide the integer fuzzy membership values in the Reclassification process. If fuzzy memberships with one significant figure are desired, use a divisor of 10 for integers in the Reclassification of 1, 2, 3, 4, ..., 10.

param.name: fmcat
param.dialogReference: Enter the name of the real valued fuzzy membership raster to be created by this process.
